Hi, I'm James!

A soccer playing,
music making,
web-developing student.

Bio

I'm a born and raised Vermonter, currently in my junior year at the University of Vermont where I'm studying political science and French. After class, I can be found at practice with the Lawrence Debate Union or representing UVM's chapter of the Yale-founded, "Every Vote Counts." Problem solving to help folks is important to me.

In the way of programming, web-development has really taken my heart; that anyone can easily deploy code without special requisites for the user blows my mind. Particularly, I'm interested in working with the JAMstack and focusing on user experience.

If you'd like to make something happen, definitely reach out!
